HI

My name is Anna Odeh and I am a designer with a strong track record. I am specializing not only in branding identities, but also web, professional model retouching photography, illustration, typography, package design and digital art.

From initial ideas to final execution, I provide for my clients my creativity and technical experience. This provides the company with a better brand image and increased profitability.

After living in three different countries, not only did I learn their native languages, but I also adopted a unique style in my work that combines these three unique cultures.
